original:
The middle of Graphics Board!
Isn't it cool?
translation:
The middle of Graphics Board!
Isn't it cool?

original:
Are you collecting DigiPlates for the
Evolution Tree?
Apparently you can find Baihumon's
Plate on an Expedition.
But it seems only a level 70+ Mega
Digimon can find it♪
translation:
Are you collecting DigiPlates for the
Evolution Tree?
Apparently you can find Baihumon's
Plate on an Expedition.
But it seems only a level 70+ Mega
Digimon can find it♪

original:
Wrooooah!
I'm gonna gain levels, too!
translation:
Wrooooah!
I'm gonna gain levels, too!

original:
Thank you for your help,
^P.
Our family is carefree like always,
but I'm feeling tired.
I think I'm gonna take a rest here
for a little while.
translation:
Thank you for your help,
^P.
Our family is carefree like always,
but I'm feeling tired.
I think I'm gonna take a rest here
for a little while.

original:
You came from a different world?

Hmm, I'd like to visit that other
world someday.
translation:
You came from a different world?

Hmm, I'd like to visit that other
world someday.

original:
^P... I came here to 
soothe my soul...
Please talk with me regularly, 
okay...?
translation:
^P... I came here to 
soothe my soul...
Please talk with me regularly, 
okay...?

original:
Hey... you're taking requests from
everyone, right?
I've listed my conditions, so could
you please fulfill my request?
translation:
Hey... you're taking requests from
everyone, right?
I've listed my conditions, so could
you please fulfill my request?

original:
Huh? Aren't you the Tamer who 
came to pick up Hiroyuki?
How's that kid doing, anyway?

He's nothing but trouble, so he's
staying back at the DigiBase?
Well, I guess that was expected.
translation:
Huh? Aren't you the Tamer who 
came to pick up Hiroyuki?
How's that kid doing, anyway?

He's nothing but trouble, so he's
staying back at the DigiBase?
Well, I guess that was expected.

original:
Graphics Board Continent...?

Ummm... I think I've heard that
name before...
Is that where Ace is?
Oh, our rookie, too?
I see. Well, you seem to be doing 
well, so I don't need to worry.
translation:
Graphics Board Continent...?

Ummm... I think I've heard that
name before...
Is that where Ace is?
Oh, our rookie, too?
I see. Well, you seem to be doing 
well, so I don't need to worry.

original:
You became a Bronze Tamer...?
How'd you do that??
At the DigiColosseum? You mean
the Union one? That's still around?!
Huh... I don't really get it, but
that's incredible!
I'll totally give you my respect for
gaining a Tamer rank!
translation:
You became a Bronze Tamer...?
How'd you do that??
At the DigiColosseum? You mean
the Union one? That's still around?!
Huh... I don't really get it, but
that's incredible!
I'll totally give you my respect for
gaining a Tamer rank!

original:
You're a Silver Tamer now...?
That's pretty amazing...
The level of the humans here is 
much lower.
Even just having a Digivice is cause
for amazement...
translation:
You're a Silver Tamer now...?
That's pretty amazing...
The level of the humans here is 
much lower.
Even just having a Digivice is cause
for amazement...

original:
G...Gold Tamer?!
That's incredible...
But even if you talk with such
magnitude...
We who can't become Tamers are
just useless in the grand scheme...
translation:
G...Gold Tamer?!
That's incredible...
But even if you talk with such
magnitude...
We who can't become Tamers are
just useless in the grand scheme...

original:
The Selectors attacked the 
DigiColosseum...?
And they kidnapped all the
Tamers and Digimon?!
No way... Without them, we can't
stand up against the Selectors!
Even if you're a Gold Tamer, 
I doubt you can even beat them...
translation:
The Selectors attacked the 
DigiColosseum...?
And they kidnapped all the
Tamers and Digimon?!
No way... Without them, we can't
stand up against the Selectors!
Even if you're a Gold Tamer, 
I doubt you can even beat them...

original:
If you're looking for that Rookie
Tamer, they are not here anymore.
Ever since you left, they were just in
a constant state of unrest,
And so we ended up firing them.

What's up with the guards here?
We better do something about this.
You can't protect the world from
its struggles just yet!
You're just too young!
translation:
If you're looking for that Rookie
Tamer, they are not here anymore.
Ever since you left, they were just in
a constant state of unrest,
And so we ended up firing them.

What's up with the guards here?
We better do something about this.
You can't protect the world from
its struggles just yet!
You're just too young!

original:
You found our rookie, as well as
Ace?
I don't care for Ace, but our rookie
sure got strong, huh?
And it's thanks to you.

Our rookie was really thrilled to
meet someone of your caliber.
He's got good sense as a
Tamer,
But he still has a lot to learn
if he's gonna make it.
translation:
You found our rookie, as well as
Ace?
I don't care for Ace, but our rookie
sure got strong, huh?
And it's thanks to you.

Our rookie was really thrilled to
meet someone of your caliber.
He's got good sense as a
Tamer,
But he still has a lot to learn
if he's gonna make it.

original:
Oh?
You finally earned a Tamer rank!
So you had some battles over in the
DigiColosseum, eh?
Just as expected! Gaining ranks 
will be a breeze for you!
I'm sure you'll continue rising in
rank from here onwards!
translation:
Oh?
You finally earned a Tamer rank!
So you had some battles over in the
DigiColosseum, eh?
Just as expected! Gaining ranks 
will be a breeze for you!
I'm sure you'll continue rising in
rank from here onwards!

original:
What the? Since when did you 
reach Silver rank...
...What?!

Ace and the rookie were there?
At the DigiColosseum??
I can understand Ace being there,
but.... I see, nevermind.
Those two are off doing good 
things, and that's what matters.
translation:
What the? Since when did you 
reach Silver rank...
...What?!

Ace and the rookie were there?
At the DigiColosseum??
I can understand Ace being there,
but.... I see, nevermind.
Those two are off doing good 
things, and that's what matters.

original:
So you've reached Gold Rank...
That's no easy feat!
What?! Your opponent was our
rookie?!
...I see, and obviously you're
the one who won.
But they were strong, huh?
I knew they've been improving...
translation:
So you've reached Gold Rank...
That's no easy feat!
What?! Your opponent was our
rookie?!
...I see, and obviously you're
the one who won.
But they were strong, huh?
I knew they've been improving...

original:
I know that the Selectors attacked
the DigiColosseum...
I also heard that the Digimon and
Tamers were kidnapped.
Were our two there, as well?!

I see, our rookie is safe... 
That's a relief...
But I'm concerned about Ace...

I can see him getting into a lot
of trouble...
translation:
I know that the Selectors attacked
the DigiColosseum...
I also heard that the Digimon and
Tamers were kidnapped.
Were our two there, as well?!

I see, our rookie is safe... 
That's a relief...
But I'm concerned about Ace...

I can see him getting into a lot
of trouble...

original:
Ah, ^P, right?
How's Hiroyuki doing?
...Same as usual?
That's good.
translation:
Ah, ^P, right?
How's Hiroyuki doing?
...Same as usual?
That's good.

original:
Where have you been?
...Graphics Board Continent??
A place where all the Tamers of the
Digital World are gathering?
Whoa! That sound amazing!
translation:
Where have you been?
...Graphics Board Continent??
A place where all the Tamers of the
Digital World are gathering?
Whoa! That sound amazing!

original:
You're a Bronze Tamer?
Whoa... how'd that happen?
You gained the rank over at the
DigiColosseum...?
Does the Tamer Union still battle it
out in order to rank up?
I see... Even now, that's still 
happening, huh...
translation:
You're a Bronze Tamer?
Whoa... how'd that happen?
You gained the rank over at the
DigiColosseum...?
Does the Tamer Union still battle it
out in order to rank up?
I see... Even now, that's still 
happening, huh...

original:
You're a Silver Tamer, now?
Wow, congratulations!♪
Did you know I also achieved
Silver Rank back in the day?
So I totally understand how much
of an accomplishment that is!
translation:
You're a Silver Tamer, now?
Wow, congratulations!♪
Did you know I also achieved
Silver Rank back in the day?
So I totally understand how much
of an accomplishment that is!

original:
You're a Gold Tamer?!
Now that's incredible!
As it was many years ago,
becoming a Gold Tamer is special♪
translation:
You're a Gold Tamer?!
Now that's incredible!
As it was many years ago,
becoming a Gold Tamer is special♪

original:
...What?!

The DigiColosseum was attacked?!
And by the Selectors, at that?!
Everyone was kidnapped...
Is there anything we can do...?
And by 'we', I mean 'you'.
You're the only one strong enough.
Please, ^P...

There's no other Tamer around as
reliable as you!
translation:
...What?!

The DigiColosseum was attacked?!
And by the Selectors, at that?!
Everyone was kidnapped...
Is there anything we can do...?
And by 'we', I mean 'you'.
You're the only one strong enough.
Please, ^P...

There's no other Tamer around as
reliable as you!

original:
Ah, ^P!♪
How have you been?
You haven't been to Palace 
Laboratory yet, have you?
...Oh, you've already been?
You really are working hard!
translation:
Ah, ^P!♪
How have you been?
You haven't been to Palace 
Laboratory yet, have you?
...Oh, you've already been?
You really are working hard!

original:
Oh, you found Ace?
And you found our rookie, too?
Where? ...Graphics Board 
Continent? Never heard of it...
But so long as they're safe, that's
what's important here.
translation:
Oh, you found Ace?
And you found our rookie, too?
Where? ...Graphics Board 
Continent? Never heard of it...
But so long as they're safe, that's
what's important here.

original:
You're a Bronze Tamer?
Really? Are you really??
Kyaaah!
^P, you're so cool!
translation:
You're a Bronze Tamer?
Really? Are you really??
Kyaaah!
^P, you're so cool!

original:
You're a Silver Tamer?!
I can't believe it!
Seriously, I can't believe it.
Sounds like some crazy story.
translation:
You're a Silver Tamer?!
I can't believe it!
Seriously, I can't believe it.
Sounds like some crazy story.

original:
You're a Gold Tamer?!
Ahahahaha...
This is too much...
I just can't comprehend this.
translation:
You're a Gold Tamer?!
Ahahahaha...
This is too much...
I just can't comprehend this.

original:
Platinum Tamer? What's that?
A rank above Gold??
Hahahaha... Jeez,
all these ranks...
I don't even know about all these
different Tamer Ranks...
.........
.........
Ah, sorry, I stopped listening 
after that.
translation:
Platinum Tamer? What's that?
A rank above Gold??
Hahahaha... Jeez,
all these ranks...
I don't even know about all these
different Tamer Ranks...
.........
.........
Ah, sorry, I stopped listening 
after that.

original:
Want some advice?
Make some strong armor!
translation:
Want some advice?
Make some strong armor!

original:
Oh, ^P!
Wanna hear something cool?
You can find Ebonwumon's Plate
during Expeditions.
But you'll need two level 70+
Ultimate Digimon to get it!
You should jot this down!
translation:
Oh, ^P!
Wanna hear something cool?
You can find Ebonwumon's Plate
during Expeditions.
But you'll need two level 70+
Ultimate Digimon to get it!
You should jot this down!

original:
Oh, ^P! 
I've been looking for you!
I've gotten much stronger than
I ever expected!
I'm gonna keep going like this
until I find a Tamer!
See you around!
translation:
Oh, ^P! 
I've been looking for you!
I've gotten much stronger than
I ever expected!
I'm gonna keep going like this
until I find a Tamer!
See you around!

original:
Which do you like better, 
plants or animals?
I like animals better, they're just
so much more active, you know?
translation:
Which do you like better, 
plants or animals?
I like animals better, they're just
so much more active, you know?

original:
You should be able to exchange
spare DigiPlates for it...
translation:
You should be able to exchange
spare DigiPlates for it...

original:
Well if it isn't ^P!
What a coincidence!
Really! Truly this is an incredible
coincidence!
You're so strong, I can't help but
look up to you!
From now on, I'll be copying your
training habits!
translation:
Well if it isn't ^P!
What a coincidence!
Really! Truly this is an incredible
coincidence!
You're so strong, I can't help but
look up to you!
From now on, I'll be copying your
training habits!

original:
You're talking with me agan?
You really are the best!
translation:
You're talking with me agan?
You really are the best!

original:
Hello, ^P.
Thank you for earlier.
I'm still waiting here for a reply to
my letter.
This time I'll just wait patiently for
it. Thanks again.
translation:
Hello, ^P.
Thank you for earlier.
I'm still waiting here for a reply to
my letter.
This time I'll just wait patiently for
it. Thanks again.

original:
I know it hasn't been long, but I 
have something good to tell you!
You can find Apocalymon's Plate
during Expeditions!
But you'll need a level 70+ Ultimate
Digimon to get it!
translation:
I know it hasn't been long, but I 
have something good to tell you!
You can find Apocalymon's Plate
during Expeditions!
But you'll need a level 70+ Ultimate
Digimon to get it!

original:
You beat the Local Champion? 

Then your next stop is Graphics 
Board South, right?
The road ahead splits into two
different paths.
If you head to the left, you'll come
across a DigiPort.
If you go right, you can head to
Graphics Board South.
Do you best out there.
translation:
You beat the Local Champion? 

Then your next stop is Graphics 
Board South, right?
The road ahead splits into two
different paths.
If you head to the left, you'll come
across a DigiPort.
If you go right, you can head to
Graphics Board South.
Do you best out there.

original:
I didn't think you'd return.

Since the roads around here are
such a pain to navigate.
Most Tamers don't want to come
back here.
But whatever, take your time.
translation:
I didn't think you'd return.

Since the roads around here are
such a pain to navigate.
Most Tamers don't want to come
back here.
But whatever, take your time.

original:
What? You're a Silver Tamer?
Then that means...
You entered at the Colosseum and
ranked up, huh?
That means you've defeated all the
Local Champions, right?
That's a pretty big accomplishment.
translation:
What? You're a Silver Tamer?
Then that means...
You entered at the Colosseum and
ranked up, huh?
That means you've defeated all the
Local Champions, right?
That's a pretty big accomplishment.

original:
Being a Gold Tamer means that...

You won in the Semi-Finals at the
World Championships, right...?
What's up with that... what is
someone like that doing there...
translation:
Being a Gold Tamer means that...

You won in the Semi-Finals at the
World Championships, right...?
What's up with that... what is
someone like that doing there...

original:
Ah, I heard about the 
DigiColosseum earlier.
I'm not supposed to say this,
but...
Whether it's the old Tamer Union or
the new one,
In the end, it'll still crumble.
That's just fate.
translation:
Ah, I heard about the 
DigiColosseum earlier.
I'm not supposed to say this,
but...
Whether it's the old Tamer Union or
the new one,
In the end, it'll still crumble.
That's just fate.

original:
Ha-ha!
You've come, young one!
.........

Now turn yourself around and leave!
translation:
Ha-ha!
You've come, young one!
.........

Now turn yourself around and leave!

original:
Leave.

Leave. Leave. Leave. Leave. 
Leave. Leave. Leave. Leave. 
...How many times was that?
translation:
Leave.

Leave. Leave. Leave. Leave. 
Leave. Leave. Leave. Leave. 
...How many times was that?

original:
You blew through that place in
no time!
Even though they were the
Local Champion...
Well... I guess that's how it is.
translation:
You blew through that place in
no time!
Even though they were the
Local Champion...
Well... I guess that's how it is.

original:
What? 
You entered the DigiColosseum?
Then that means you beat all four
Local Champions?
That's pretty incredible, you know.
translation:
What? 
You entered the DigiColosseum?
Then that means you beat all four
Local Champions?
That's pretty incredible, you know.

original:
What? 
You entered the DigiColosseum?
Then that means you beat all four
Local Champions?
That's pretty incredible, you know.
translation:
What? 
You entered the DigiColosseum?
Then that means you beat all four
Local Champions?
That's pretty incredible, you know.

original:
Gold Tamer...?!
You...?!
It's true... You really must be a
chosen Tamer...
translation:
Gold Tamer...?!
You...?!
It's true... You really must be a
chosen Tamer...

original:
Weren't you over at the 
DigiColosseum?
Then is that rumor really true?

That all the Tamers were erased 
by the Selectors...?
That's a lie right? Right?!
Please tell me it's a lie...!
translation:
Weren't you over at the 
DigiColosseum?
Then is that rumor really true?

That all the Tamers were erased 
by the Selectors...?
That's a lie right? Right?!
Please tell me it's a lie...!

original:
Hmmm... What?
You're a Tamer?
Coming here now, just what have
you come to do?
Whether you're some coward,
or some Tamer Elite...
Regardless, you're still disgusting!
translation:
Hmmm... What?
You're a Tamer?
Coming here now, just what have
you come to do?
Whether you're some coward,
or some Tamer Elite...
Regardless, you're still disgusting!

original: You should hurry and leave.
translation: You should hurry and leave.

original:
Hmph, while you can say you beat
the Local Champion...
But I heard she was one of your
pals from the Real World.
So she must have gone easy on 
you! Right?! I'm sure of it!
translation:
Hmph, while you can say you beat
the Local Champion...
But I heard she was one of your
pals from the Real World.
So she must have gone easy on 
you! Right?! I'm sure of it!

original:
You made it to Bronze Rank at the
DigiColosseum?!
What's up with that?! You must 
have used some sort of trick!
Y-yeah... I'm sure of it...!
translation:
You made it to Bronze Rank at the
DigiColosseum?!
What's up with that?! You must 
have used some sort of trick!
Y-yeah... I'm sure of it...!

original:
You made it to Silver Rank at the
DigiColosseum?!
What's up with that?! You must 
have used some sort of trick!
Y-yeah... I'm sure of it...!
translation:
You made it to Silver Rank at the
DigiColosseum?!
What's up with that?! You must 
have used some sort of trick!
Y-yeah... I'm sure of it...!

original:
You ranked up again...?
What's with that prideful look?!
G-Gold Tamer?!
.........
Shut up and leave me alone!
Just go away!
translation:
You ranked up again...?
What's with that prideful look?!
G-Gold Tamer?!
.........
Shut up and leave me alone!
Just go away!

original:
Hey, what are you doing here?!

You went to the DigiColosseum?
I don't know what that is!
If you're here, then you must have
lost, right?!
.........

World Champion?!
Platinum Tamer?!
.........
.........Hmph.
translation:
Hey, what are you doing here?!

You went to the DigiColosseum?
I don't know what that is!
If you're here, then you must have
lost, right?!
.........

World Champion?!
Platinum Tamer?!
.........
.........Hmph.

original:
Jeez, you're really persistent
coming here again, aren't you.
Just seeing a newbie Tamer
makes me irritated...
.........

It's like seeing my embarassing
past self...
translation:
Jeez, you're really persistent
coming here again, aren't you.
Just seeing a newbie Tamer
makes me irritated...
.........

It's like seeing my embarassing
past self...

original:
Just go away already, and don't
come back.
translation:
Just go away already, and don't
come back.

original:
That newbie who just came here...

They must have done something 
strange to the Champion, right?
Like putting thumb tacks in their
shoes...
Or a wet rag into their coffee...
translation:
That newbie who just came here...

They must have done something 
strange to the Champion, right?
Like putting thumb tacks in their
shoes...
Or a wet rag into their coffee...

original:
You ranked up at the 
DigiColosseum...?
Ah, I see. Good for you.
You're amazing. Reaaally.
translation:
You ranked up at the 
DigiColosseum...?
Ah, I see. Good for you.
You're amazing. Reaaally.

original:
You ranked up at the 
DigiColosseum...?
Ah, I see. Good for you.
You're amazing. Reaaally.
translation:
You ranked up at the 
DigiColosseum...?
Ah, I see. Good for you.
You're amazing. Reaaally.

original:
You ranked up at the 
DigiColosseum...?
Ah, I see. Good for you.
You're amazing. Reaaally.
translation:
You ranked up at the 
DigiColosseum...?
Ah, I see. Good for you.
You're amazing. Reaaally.

original:
The new Tamer Union at the 
DigiColosseum was annihilated?
W-what?! By who?!
The Selectors?! Really?!
...Hey wait, what are you doing 
standing around here...?!
You're strong, aren't you?!
Go and destroy those Selectors!
translation:
The new Tamer Union at the 
DigiColosseum was annihilated?
W-what?! By who?!
The Selectors?! Really?!
...Hey wait, what are you doing 
standing around here...?!
You're strong, aren't you?!
Go and destroy those Selectors!

original:
This place is pretty gloomy, don't
you think?
That's because the serious 
Tamers already moved on.
Only those who're gloomy remain
here, now.
translation:
This place is pretty gloomy, don't
you think?
That's because the serious 
Tamers already moved on.
Only those who're gloomy remain
here, now.

original:
It's a good idea to get out of this
city as soon as possible.
If you stay here too long, you'll 
start rotting away, too.
It won't be anyone's fault but
your own...
translation:
It's a good idea to get out of this
city as soon as possible.
If you stay here too long, you'll 
start rotting away, too.
It won't be anyone's fault but
your own...

original:
Whoa... You beat the Local
Champion?
Aw... I thought I was gonna be the
one to beat them!
...Sorry, that's just a lie.
translation:
Whoa... You beat the Local
Champion?
Aw... I thought I was gonna be the
one to beat them!
...Sorry, that's just a lie.

original:
You entered the Championship at
the DigiColosseum?
Whoa... It feels like we're living
in two different worlds, now...
translation:
You entered the Championship at
the DigiColosseum?
Whoa... It feels like we're living
in two different worlds, now...

original:
You entered the Championship at
the DigiColosseum?
Whoa... It feels like we're living
in two different worlds, now...
translation:
You entered the Championship at
the DigiColosseum?
Whoa... It feels like we're living
in two different worlds, now...

original:
"I've become a Gold Tamer"
...Really, now?
Saying something so amazing with
such a straight face...
translation:
"I've become a Gold Tamer"
...Really, now?
Saying something so amazing with
such a straight face...

original:
...Hm?
What's up with you...?
What's with that strange look?
Did something happen?
I see... All the Tamers at the
DigiColosseum were wiped out...
...WHAT?! They were wiped out?!
What do you mean by that?!
translation:
...Hm?
What's up with you...?
What's with that strange look?
Did something happen?
I see... All the Tamers at the
DigiColosseum were wiped out...
...WHAT?! They were wiped out?!
What do you mean by that?!

original:
A Tamer new to Graphics Board
Continent...
His eyes had that same shine that
yours do...
translation:
A Tamer new to Graphics Board
Continent...
His eyes had that same shine that
yours do...

original:
Tamers like you who come here
tend to change...
First they come all fired up,
then they start to feel dazzled...
But then they start wavering...
Feeling suddenly dizzy...
And then they end up
becoming useless.
translation:
Tamers like you who come here
tend to change...
First they come all fired up,
then they start to feel dazzled...
But then they start wavering...
Feeling suddenly dizzy...
And then they end up
becoming useless.

original:
Hmmm... So you defeated the 
Local Champion.
I had no doubt that someone of
your caliber could do it...
But I can't help but feel frustrated.
translation:
Hmmm... So you defeated the 
Local Champion.
I had no doubt that someone of
your caliber could do it...
But I can't help but feel frustrated.

original:
You're a Bronze Tamer, now?
That's great, but...
Why'd it have to be you who
struggled to the DigiColosseum?!
translation:
You're a Bronze Tamer, now?
That's great, but...
Why'd it have to be you who
struggled to the DigiColosseum?!

original:
What?! Could you be...
A Silver Tamer?!
You have some incredible motivation
to reach this level...
translation:
What?! Could you be...
A Silver Tamer?!
You have some incredible motivation
to reach this level...

original:
What... you're already a Gold
Tamer, now...?
I could see potential in you when
we originally first met, but...
I never expected you'd come this
far...
translation:
What... you're already a Gold
Tamer, now...?
I could see potential in you when
we originally first met, but...
I never expected you'd come this
far...

original:
The Union at the DigiColosseum 
was attacked by the Selectors?
And on top of that, the Digimon 
and Tamers were...?
.........
They were all eliminated?!
...This is it.
The Digital World is finished...!
translation:
The Union at the DigiColosseum 
was attacked by the Selectors?
And on top of that, the Digimon 
and Tamers were...?
.........
They were all eliminated?!
...This is it.
The Digital World is finished...!

original:
A long time ago...
I was a Tamer, too...
...As if anyone would believe that!
Stuuupid!
Is your head nothing more than 
a mannequin for decorations?
A display stand for a set of 
goggles with nothing inside?
translation:
A long time ago...
I was a Tamer, too...
...As if anyone would believe that!
Stuuupid!
Is your head nothing more than 
a mannequin for decorations?
A display stand for a set of 
goggles with nothing inside?

original:
Jeez you're annoying!
Just stop talking to me, already!
translation:
Jeez you're annoying!
Just stop talking to me, already!

original:
You beat the Local Champion...?

Fine, whatever! Just stop talking 
to me, already!
translation:
You beat the Local Champion...?

Fine, whatever! Just stop talking 
to me, already!

original:
You became a Bronze Tamer...?

Fine, whatever! Just stop talking 
to me, already!
translation:
You became a Bronze Tamer...?

Fine, whatever! Just stop talking 
to me, already!

original:
You became a Silver Tamer...?

Fine, whatever! Just stop talking 
to me, already!
translation:
You became a Silver Tamer...?

Fine, whatever! Just stop talking 
to me, already!

original:
You became a Gold Tamer...?
Just shut up already!
Don't talk to me! Don't look at me 
with those sparkling eyes!
Don't talk to me about your
success story! You're so annoying!
I'm begging you, just leave me
alone!
translation:
You became a Gold Tamer...?
Just shut up already!
Don't talk to me! Don't look at me 
with those sparkling eyes!
Don't talk to me about your
success story! You're so annoying!
I'm begging you, just leave me
alone!

original:
Have you finally become a Platinum
Tamer...? What's that?
The DigiColosseum was attacked?
And the Tamers and Digimon...?
They were all kidnapped...?
.........
Hmph, well it's not like I can do
anything about it anyway...
You should go save them.
You're a Platinum Tamer, right?!
translation:
Have you finally become a Platinum
Tamer...? What's that?
The DigiColosseum was attacked?
And the Tamers and Digimon...?
They were all kidnapped...?
.........
Hmph, well it's not like I can do
anything about it anyway...
You should go save them.
You're a Platinum Tamer, right?!

original:
What's a brat like you doing here?

If you don't wanna get hurt, then
you'd better leave right now.
If you don't, you'll just become a
weak adult like the others here!
translation:
What's a brat like you doing here?

If you don't wanna get hurt, then
you'd better leave right now.
If you don't, you'll just become a
weak adult like the others here!

original: Please, just go.
translation: Please, just go.

original:
You beat the Local Champion of
this city...?!
For a brat, you're pretty strong...
translation:
You beat the Local Champion of
this city...?!
For a brat, you're pretty strong...

original:
A brat like you made it to
Bronze Tamer rank?!
Well, I guess most Tamers here
are old and unmotivated...
translation:
A brat like you made it to
Bronze Tamer rank?!
Well, I guess most Tamers here
are old and unmotivated...

original:
A brat like you made it to
Silver Tamer rank?!
You don't look that strong, but I
guess looks can be deceiving...
translation:
A brat like you made it to
Silver Tamer rank?!
You don't look that strong, but I
guess looks can be deceiving...

original:
A brat like you made it to
Gold Tamer rank?!
Uhmmm... I'm sorry for calling you
a brat, before...
translation:
A brat like you made it to
Gold Tamer rank?!
Uhmmm... I'm sorry for calling you
a brat, before...

original:
Hey, don't tell me you're a 
Platinum Tamer, now...?!
.........
...What? The Selectors?
I'm in shock right now, so it's best
you hold off on any stories...
translation:
Hey, don't tell me you're a 
Platinum Tamer, now...?!
.........
...What? The Selectors?
I'm in shock right now, so it's best
you hold off on any stories...

original:
Hey, did you hear?

There are only two types of 
Tamers in this city.
Those who have separated with 
their Digimon, and those who will.
The ones who don't are those who 
never had Partners to begin with!
translation:
Hey, did you hear?

There are only two types of 
Tamers in this city.
Those who have separated with 
their Digimon, and those who will.
The ones who don't are those who 
never had Partners to begin with!

original:
The only ones who haven't 
separated from their partners here...
Are the Local Champion, and that
one Guard Tamer.
I don't really know why, and I don't
want to know.
translation:
The only ones who haven't 
separated from their partners here...
Are the Local Champion, and that
one Guard Tamer.
I don't really know why, and I don't
want to know.

original:
So the Local Champion separated
from their Partner, too?
Separating and throwing away, 
that's all you hear around here... 
Hm? There are those who can
stick together, too?
...That's good to hear!
translation:
So the Local Champion separated
from their Partner, too?
Separating and throwing away, 
that's all you hear around here... 
Hm? There are those who can
stick together, too?
...That's good to hear!

original:
What is it?
You're a Bronze Tamer?
So have you changed?

...You haven't, huh?
Hmmm... how boring.
translation:
What is it?
You're a Bronze Tamer?
So have you changed?

...You haven't, huh?
Hmmm... how boring.

original:
What is it?
You're a Silver Tamer?
So have you changed?

...So you haven't, huh?

You just gotta tell me you've 
changed, even if it's a lie!
translation:
What is it?
You're a Silver Tamer?
So have you changed?

...So you haven't, huh?

You just gotta tell me you've 
changed, even if it's a lie!

original:
What is it?
You're a Gold Tamer?
So have you changed?

...So you haven't, huh?
That's just a lie, though, isn't it?
translation:
What is it?
You're a Gold Tamer?
So have you changed?

...So you haven't, huh?
That's just a lie, though, isn't it?

original:
What is it?
You're a Platinum Tamer?
So have you changed?

You haven't, but the Selectors 
attacked the DigiColosseum?
Hey, why do you say that with such
a straight face?! That's terrible!
This isn't the time or place to be
messing around!
translation:
What is it?
You're a Platinum Tamer?
So have you changed?

You haven't, but the Selectors 
attacked the DigiColosseum?
Hey, why do you say that with such
a straight face?! That's terrible!
This isn't the time or place to be
messing around!

original:
I am the best Angewomon in the
Digital World.
There is no doubt about that.

I am the most fierce,
the most frightening,
the most narrow-minded,
and the most childish.
translation:
I am the best Angewomon in the
Digital World.
There is no doubt about that.

I am the most fierce,
the most frightening,
the most narrow-minded,
and the most childish.

original:
Since coming here, I learned 
something new about myself.
That my kindness has its limits.

And that limit is unexpectedly
small.
translation:
Since coming here, I learned 
something new about myself.
That my kindness has its limits.

And that limit is unexpectedly
small.

original:
So you were the one who defeated
the Local Champion.
But you plan on moving forward
instead of sticking around, right?
I thought you would.

Only losers will remain in this kind
of place, after all.
translation:
So you were the one who defeated
the Local Champion.
But you plan on moving forward
instead of sticking around, right?
I thought you would.

Only losers will remain in this kind
of place, after all.

original:
A Bronze Tamer huh...
You're just full of surprises.
Entering the DigiColosseum is
nothing but an empty dream here...
Not to mention even getting a
Tamer Rank...
translation:
A Bronze Tamer huh...
You're just full of surprises.
Entering the DigiColosseum is
nothing but an empty dream here...
Not to mention even getting a
Tamer Rank...

original:
You've made it to Silver Tamer, so
what are you doing here...?
This place doesn't have anything
a Silver Tamer would need,
nor anything for a Silver Tamer
to do...
You should go back to where 
you're needed.
translation:
You've made it to Silver Tamer, so
what are you doing here...?
This place doesn't have anything
a Silver Tamer would need,
nor anything for a Silver Tamer
to do...
You should go back to where 
you're needed.

original:
So you ranked up to Gold Tamer
at the DigiColosseum...
And even made it to the final match
of the Championships...
.........

Your words stir something within
my heart...
translation:
So you ranked up to Gold Tamer
at the DigiColosseum...
And even made it to the final match
of the Championships...
.........

Your words stir something within
my heart...

original:
I heard a rumor that the 
DigiColosseum was attacked...
But I'm not worried at all, because
we have a Platinum Tamer,
As well as the World Champion
right here!
You'll help save all those who've
been kidnapped, right?
translation:
I heard a rumor that the 
DigiColosseum was attacked...
But I'm not worried at all, because
we have a Platinum Tamer,
As well as the World Champion
right here!
You'll help save all those who've
been kidnapped, right?

original:
Hey, did you hear?
It's just a rumor, but...
Apparently the Local Champion
has changed, again...
From a cynical old man,
to a cynical middle aged man,
And now this time it's a cynical
young girl...
So to sum it up... Everyone in this
city is cynical, don't you think?
translation:
Hey, did you hear?
It's just a rumor, but...
Apparently the Local Champion
has changed, again...
From a cynical old man,
to a cynical middle aged man,
And now this time it's a cynical
young girl...
So to sum it up... Everyone in this
city is cynical, don't you think?

original:
In the end, only useless Tamers
who don't continue moving ahead...
Will stay and laze around this 
place...
But if you go through the gate 
behind me and keep going...
It seems you can reach Graphics
Board South.
translation:
In the end, only useless Tamers
who don't continue moving ahead...
Will stay and laze around this 
place...
But if you go through the gate 
behind me and keep going...
It seems you can reach Graphics
Board South.

original:
Hey, did you hear?
The Local Champion changed again.
...What?
You defeated them...?
Huh... So that means you're the
new Local Champion...
You're leaving the position to the
Guard Tamer?! What a waste...
translation:
Hey, did you hear?
The Local Champion changed again.
...What?
You defeated them...?
Huh... So that means you're the
new Local Champion...
You're leaving the position to the
Guard Tamer?! What a waste...

original:
Hey, I heard a rumor that you made
it to Bronze Tamer... Is that true?
Oh, so it is true.

As I thought, you're on a different
level to those in this city.
translation:
Hey, I heard a rumor that you made
it to Bronze Tamer... Is that true?
Oh, so it is true.

As I thought, you're on a different
level to those in this city.

original:
Hey, I heard a rumor that you made
it to Silver Tamer... Is that true?
Whoa, so it is true.

You shine so brightly now, I can't
see anything else in front of me.
translation:
Hey, I heard a rumor that you made
it to Silver Tamer... Is that true?
Whoa, so it is true.

You shine so brightly now, I can't
see anything else in front of me.

original:
Hey, I heard a rumor that you made
it to Gold Tamer... Is that true?
Wow! So it is true.

I'm at a loss for words, now...
translation:
Hey, I heard a rumor that you made
it to Gold Tamer... Is that true?
Wow! So it is true.

I'm at a loss for words, now...

original:
Hey, I heard a rumor that you made
it to Platinum Tamer... Is that true?
...But you don't look so happy
about such an achievement...
Your friends got kidnapped and
you're gonna fight the Selectors?
Platinum Tamers really are on
a totally different level...
translation:
Hey, I heard a rumor that you made
it to Platinum Tamer... Is that true?
...But you don't look so happy
about such an achievement...
Your friends got kidnapped and
you're gonna fight the Selectors?
Platinum Tamers really are on
a totally different level...

original:
Thank ya so much!
Really, thank ya!
translation:
Thank ya so much!
Really, thank ya!

original:
I'm so sorry, I can't do anything
here...
I'm ashamed to face my friend who
showed me the way out.
translation:
I'm so sorry, I can't do anything
here...
I'm ashamed to face my friend who
showed me the way out.

original:
So you beat the Local Champion of
East City, huh...
That's pretty incredible...
It's no easy feat!
translation:
So you beat the Local Champion of
East City, huh...
That's pretty incredible...
It's no easy feat!

original:
While I understand you've become
a Bronze Tamer...
Could you please leave me alone
for a little while...?
When I hear about you, I feel a pain
deep in my chest...
translation:
While I understand you've become
a Bronze Tamer...
Could you please leave me alone
for a little while...?
When I hear about you, I feel a pain
deep in my chest...

original:
O-oh, I'm surprised...
I knew you were amazing...
But to think you're already a
Silver Tamer...?
.........
I'm gonna be honest with you...
I'm extremely envious of you.
translation:
O-oh, I'm surprised...
I knew you were amazing...
But to think you're already a
Silver Tamer...?
.........
I'm gonna be honest with you...
I'm extremely envious of you.

original:
You're already a Gold Tamer?
That's really impressive.
You're amazing, indeed.

......
In contrast, it makes me wonder...
Just what am I doing, here?
What am I waiting for?
translation:
You're already a Gold Tamer?
That's really impressive.
You're amazing, indeed.

......
In contrast, it makes me wonder...
Just what am I doing, here?
What am I waiting for?

original:
.........
...I'm the worst...
The new Tamer Union was 
attacked by the Selectors...
When I heard the news...
I felt relieved...
Even though the reason I'm no
good as a Tamer...
Isn't because everyone else is
better than me...
translation:
.........
...I'm the worst...
The new Tamer Union was 
attacked by the Selectors...
When I heard the news...
I felt relieved...
Even though the reason I'm no
good as a Tamer...
Isn't because everyone else is
better than me...

original:
What is this restless feeling?
I just can't calm down...
After defeating the Local Champion
I feel I have no strength to go on.
Yet I can't just return to where
I used to be.
I'm just left standing here feeling
irritated forever.
translation:
What is this restless feeling?
I just can't calm down...
After defeating the Local Champion
I feel I have no strength to go on.
Yet I can't just return to where
I used to be.
I'm just left standing here feeling
irritated forever.

original:
Apparently, when people first come
to this city, they get irritated,
But after a while, they suddenly
start to feel better.
But if that happens, their humanity
is gone... or so I heard.
translation:
Apparently, when people first come
to this city, they get irritated,
But after a while, they suddenly
start to feel better.
But if that happens, their humanity
is gone... or so I heard.

original:
You beat the Local Champion?
Stop joking around!
I've fought that Tamer before!

How can any decent Tamer beat
a monster like him!
translation:
You beat the Local Champion?
Stop joking around!
I've fought that Tamer before!

How can any decent Tamer beat
a monster like him!

original:
Ah, so the rumor was true...

The Local Champion here was
defeated and ran away,
And the Tamer who beat him had
also beat another Local Champion.
Now that Tamer is fighting over at
the DigiColosseum...
You're that Tamer, aren't you?
translation:
Ah, so the rumor was true...

The Local Champion here was
defeated and ran away,
And the Tamer who beat him had
also beat another Local Champion.
Now that Tamer is fighting over at
the DigiColosseum...
You're that Tamer, aren't you?

original:
This is something that I heard from
an older Tamer, but...
He said that Silver Tamers weren't 
so rare years ago...
But they sure are now...
translation:
This is something that I heard from
an older Tamer, but...
He said that Silver Tamers weren't 
so rare years ago...
But they sure are now...

original:
Did you come here to boast about
becoming a Gold Tamer?
How do you think we'd feel when
we heard something like that?
You don't know?
Of course you wouldn't.
translation:
Did you come here to boast about
becoming a Gold Tamer?
How do you think we'd feel when
we heard something like that?
You don't know?
Of course you wouldn't.

original:
The incredible Tamers at the
DigiColosseum were all kidnapped?
By the Selectors?? They got the
Bronze, Silver and Gold Tamers...?
Ha...Hahaha...
What are you going on about...?
translation:
The incredible Tamers at the
DigiColosseum were all kidnapped?
By the Selectors?? They got the
Bronze, Silver and Gold Tamers...?
Ha...Hahaha...
What are you going on about...?

original:
Somehow I no longer feel like
staying here...
But it'll be boring if I quit now...

Hmmm... What should I do...
translation:
Somehow I no longer feel like
staying here...
But it'll be boring if I quit now...

Hmmm... What should I do...

original:
What's difficult isn't taking up
a challenge...
But giving up on a challenge.

I'm sure you'll understand in
30 years.
translation:
What's difficult isn't taking up
a challenge...
But giving up on a challenge.

I'm sure you'll understand in
30 years.

original:
It's so fun! Yeah!
I'm glad I'm a Tamer!
I'm so glad that I came to the
Digital World!
translation:
It's so fun! Yeah!
I'm glad I'm a Tamer!
I'm so glad that I came to the
Digital World!

original: Uhyohyohyo...♪
translation: Uhyohyohyo...♪

original:
Although it's only local, being
a Local Champion would be great♪
'Cause it'd feel like you've become
awesome.♪
Though it would be a real 
godsend♪
translation:
Although it's only local, being
a Local Champion would be great♪
'Cause it'd feel like you've become
awesome.♪
Though it would be a real 
godsend♪

original:
What? You ranked up?
You're a Bronze Tamer now...?
Come on, you're better than that!
Keep at it!
translation:
What? You ranked up?
You're a Bronze Tamer now...?
Come on, you're better than that!
Keep at it!

original:
So you ranked up to Silver Tamer...

Y.........

...You're so lucky...!
translation:
So you ranked up to Silver Tamer...

Y.........

...You're so lucky...!

original:
Y-you ranked up to Gold Tamer?!
You actually made it?!
Jeez... way to make the rest of us
feel more left behind...
translation:
Y-you ranked up to Gold Tamer?!
You actually made it?!
Jeez... way to make the rest of us
feel more left behind...

original:
You participated in the World
Championship... So awesome...
.........
...Then what happened?
Y-you won?!
What?! World Champion?!
Are...

Are you an idiot?!
Just how much stronger are you?!
translation:
You participated in the World
Championship... So awesome...
.........
...Then what happened?
Y-you won?!
What?! World Champion?!
Are...

Are you an idiot?!
Just how much stronger are you?!

original:
Don't you think that strength is 
strong? It's not fair! 
I bet you're a Digimon, and your 
party are the Tamers!
I say that, but I don't even know
what I'm going on about...
translation:
Don't you think that strength is 
strong? It's not fair! 
I bet you're a Digimon, and your 
party are the Tamers!
I say that, but I don't even know
what I'm going on about...

original:
I don't really understand it at all,
but...
I feel so good for some reason!
translation:
I don't really understand it at all,
but...
I feel so good for some reason!

original: Bwahahaha...!
translation: Bwahahaha...!

original:
Have you been to South City?
If you leave from here..
Go to the gate where the Guard
Tamer is,
Near there is the DigiPort Task
Port South.
Head off to the side and you'll
enter Graphics Board South.
translation:
Have you been to South City?
If you leave from here..
Go to the gate where the Guard
Tamer is,
Near there is the DigiPort Task
Port South.
Head off to the side and you'll
enter Graphics Board South.

original:
So you've already entered the
Championship...
After you defeat all four city 
champions,
You can finally stand at the
starting line, right...?
For someone like me, that's 
totally impossible.
I can't even hope to defeat the
Local Champion here, Bibir.
translation:
So you've already entered the
Championship...
After you defeat all four city 
champions,
You can finally stand at the
starting line, right...?
For someone like me, that's 
totally impossible.
I can't even hope to defeat the
Local Champion here, Bibir.

original:
Silver Tamer?
I'm not surprised at all.
With your strength, it was only
obvious you'd get this far.
translation:
Silver Tamer?
I'm not surprised at all.
With your strength, it was only
obvious you'd get this far.

original:
G-gold Tamer...
I-I'm not surprised at all...
I know you had... that kind of
power in you...
translation:
G-gold Tamer...
I-I'm not surprised at all...
I know you had... that kind of
power in you...

original:
...What?!
What did you say?!
Kernel? Who's that?!
Not that, what you said before 
that..
World...
World Champion...?!
You?! You're the World Champion?!
How?!
translation:
...What?!
What did you say?!
Kernel? Who's that?!
Not that, what you said before 
that..
World...
World Champion...?!
You?! You're the World Champion?!
How?!

original:
.........
.........
Whoa! You surprised me!
I had no time to react...
The Digital World is in danger...?
Like I care about that!
translation:
.........
.........
Whoa! You surprised me!
I had no time to react...
The Digital World is in danger...?
Like I care about that!

original:
Welcome to the Item Shop!
Is there anything you need?
translation:
Welcome to the Item Shop!
Is there anything you need?

original:
This is the Farm Shop.
Do you need anything?
translation:
This is the Farm Shop.
Do you need anything?

original:
If you're going to Graphics Board
West, head up this ladder.
If you climb the ladder on the right,
you'll reach a DigiPort, too.
And if you climb the ladder on the
left,
It'll take you to Graphics Board
West.
West City is beyond the freezing
Access Glacier.
And if you want to go to any 
other places...
I don't know anything more!
translation:
If you're going to Graphics Board
West, head up this ladder.
If you climb the ladder on the right,
you'll reach a DigiPort, too.
And if you climb the ladder on the
left,
It'll take you to Graphics Board
West.
West City is beyond the freezing
Access Glacier.
And if you want to go to any 
other places...
I don't know anything more!

original:
You became a Bronze Tamer?
Seriously...
You're skillful enough to rank up
at the DigiColosseum...?
I guess I shouldn't judge a Tamer
by their appearance...
translation:
You became a Bronze Tamer?
Seriously...
You're skillful enough to rank up
at the DigiColosseum...?
I guess I shouldn't judge a Tamer
by their appearance...

original:
So you're already a Silver Tamer...

It suits you surprisingly well.
translation:
So you're already a Silver Tamer...

It suits you surprisingly well.

original:
You're a Gold Tamer, now?
That's great and all, but,
Just how many Tamers even are
there at the DigiColosseum?
Not even 10...?
That's kinda odd.
I could have sworn there were at
least 100 Tamers...
translation:
You're a Gold Tamer, now?
That's great and all, but,
Just how many Tamers even are
there at the DigiColosseum?
Not even 10...?
That's kinda odd.
I could have sworn there were at
least 100 Tamers...

original:
The DigiColosseum was attacked
by the Selectors...?
Then the members of the New
Tamer Union were...
All kidnapped...?

I knew something terrible like this
would happen some day!
In fact, it took too long to happen!
translation:
The DigiColosseum was attacked
by the Selectors...?
Then the members of the New
Tamer Union were...
All kidnapped...?

I knew something terrible like this
would happen some day!
In fact, it took too long to happen!

original:
Someone who laughs over 
Numemon will cry over Numemon.
It takes a Numemon to know 
a Numemon!
...Huh?
That's obvious, you say...?
translation:
Someone who laughs over 
Numemon will cry over Numemon.
It takes a Numemon to know 
a Numemon!
...Huh?
That's obvious, you say...?

original:
The Local Champion has been
defeated, nume?!
Is this the end of Numemon City...?

No, we cannot allow that to happen!

We'll protect the city that that
person has built!
translation:
The Local Champion has been
defeated, nume?!
Is this the end of Numemon City...?

No, we cannot allow that to happen!

We'll protect the city that that
person has built!

original:
...Nume?

You got a Tamer Rank, nume?

Ain't that cheeky! 
Apologize to the Numemon statue!
translation:
...Nume?

You got a Tamer Rank, nume?

Ain't that cheeky! 
Apologize to the Numemon statue!

original:
...Nume, Nume?

Your Tamer Rank went up...?!
S...Silver Tamer?!
Ain't that cheeky! 
Apologize to the Numemon statue!
translation:
...Nume, Nume?

Your Tamer Rank went up...?!
S...Silver Tamer?!
Ain't that cheeky! 
Apologize to the Numemon statue!

original:
...Nume, Nume, Nume?!

Your rank has gone up ridiculously
high, nume!
Since when were you Gold Rank?!
Ain't that cheeky! 
Apologize to the Numemon statue!
translation:
...Nume, Nume, Nume?!

Your rank has gone up ridiculously
high, nume!
Since when were you Gold Rank?!
Ain't that cheeky! 
Apologize to the Numemon statue!

original:
...What?!

You're gonna save the world?
That's utter nonsense, nume!
Focus on saving the Numemon
before you save the world!
translation:
...What?!

You're gonna save the world?
That's utter nonsense, nume!
Focus on saving the Numemon
before you save the world!

original:
This place is South City, but it's 
been changed to Numemon City♪
It's a Numemon town by Numemon
for Numemon, nume!♪
translation:
This place is South City, but it's 
been changed to Numemon City♪
It's a Numemon town by Numemon
for Numemon, nume!♪

original:
The Local Champion has lost?!

Then that means you'll be the new
Champion here...?
...What?
There'll be no more Champion...?
Only the Numemon will protect this
place from now on...?
.........

It'll be our pleasure, nume!!!
translation:
The Local Champion has lost?!

Then that means you'll be the new
Champion here...?
...What?
There'll be no more Champion...?
Only the Numemon will protect this
place from now on...?
.........

It'll be our pleasure, nume!!!

original:
When I first came to this city...

The Local Champion, Tres, told us
this, nume...
"If you want to protect yourself 
and your friends, then fight."
From then on, the Numemon 
stopped being afraid, nume.
There's no place left to run, all
we can do now is fight.
But for some reason... we're 
really happy about that, nume...
translation:
When I first came to this city...

The Local Champion, Tres, told us
this, nume...
"If you want to protect yourself 
and your friends, then fight."
From then on, the Numemon 
stopped being afraid, nume.
There's no place left to run, all
we can do now is fight.
But for some reason... we're 
really happy about that, nume...

original:
When I first came to this city...

The Local Champion, Tres, told us
this, nume...
"If you want to protect yourself 
and your friends, then fight."
From then on, the Numemon 
stopped being afraid, nume.
There's no place left to run, all
we can do now is fight.
But for some reason... we're 
really happy about that, nume...
translation:
When I first came to this city...

The Local Champion, Tres, told us
this, nume...
"If you want to protect yourself 
and your friends, then fight."
From then on, the Numemon 
stopped being afraid, nume.
There's no place left to run, all
we can do now is fight.
But for some reason... we're 
really happy about that, nume...

original:
When I first came to this city...

The Local Champion, Tres, told us
this, nume...
"If you want to protect yourself 
and your friends, then fight."
From then on, the Numemon 
stopped being afraid, nume.
There's no place left to run, all
we can do now is fight.
But for some reason... we're 
really happy about that, nume...
translation:
When I first came to this city...

The Local Champion, Tres, told us
this, nume...
"If you want to protect yourself 
and your friends, then fight."
From then on, the Numemon 
stopped being afraid, nume.
There's no place left to run, all
we can do now is fight.
But for some reason... we're 
really happy about that, nume...

original:
Finally, the Selectors have come to
attack the DigiColosseum.
.........
.........
...The Bandits have always been
there for the Numemon, nume.
We thought we'd be fine, so long
as the Bandits were here...
As for those who remain in the
Digital World...
I guess you're the only other 
one we can rely on?
translation:
Finally, the Selectors have come to
attack the DigiColosseum.
.........
.........
...The Bandits have always been
there for the Numemon, nume.
We thought we'd be fine, so long
as the Bandits were here...
As for those who remain in the
Digital World...
I guess you're the only other 
one we can rely on?

original: I feel regret, nume...
translation: I feel regret, nume...

original:
So you defeated the Local 
Champion, nume?
.........
I feel regret, nume...
We wanted to protect the person
who always cared for the Numemon.
Who supported and trusted the
Numemon...
We really wanted to do that, nume...
translation:
So you defeated the Local 
Champion, nume?
.........
I feel regret, nume...
We wanted to protect the person
who always cared for the Numemon.
Who supported and trusted the
Numemon...
We really wanted to do that, nume...

original:
You're a Bronze Tamer now?
So you went to the DigiColosseum?
I'm glad, nume.
You being so skilled now...
Will bring comfort to the hearts of
those you defeated earlier.
translation:
You're a Bronze Tamer now?
So you went to the DigiColosseum?
I'm glad, nume.
You being so skilled now...
Will bring comfort to the hearts of
those you defeated earlier.

original:
You're a Silver Tamer now, nume?
You've been working hard, huh?
I guess it'd be expected I lost to
a Tamer like you, nume!
Ahhh, it was inevitable, nume!
translation:
You're a Silver Tamer now, nume?
You've been working hard, huh?
I guess it'd be expected I lost to
a Tamer like you, nume!
Ahhh, it was inevitable, nume!

original:
You're a Gold Tamer, now...?

You've become too great!
It's all too much, nume!
If you get too carried away, I'll just
pour glue on your Digivice!
translation:
You're a Gold Tamer, now...?

You've become too great!
It's all too much, nume!
If you get too carried away, I'll just
pour glue on your Digivice!

original:
Both Tamers and Digimon were
kidnapped by the Selectors, nume?
And you don't know what 
happened to the Bandits, after?
.........
.........
So that's why Tres said that to
us...
"Protect the Numemon here!"
"Don't leave this place!"
They're always going off by 
themselves and leaving us alone.
Are we really that unreliable...?
translation:
Both Tamers and Digimon were
kidnapped by the Selectors, nume?
And you don't know what 
happened to the Bandits, after?
.........
.........
So that's why Tres said that to
us...
"Protect the Numemon here!"
"Don't leave this place!"
They're always going off by 
themselves and leaving us alone.
Are we really that unreliable...?

original:
Hey you...
Have we met before?
Nah, I'm sure I don't have any
acquaintances anymore.
My only allies are the Numemon
of this city, who gave me shelter.
All the other Geremon have been
erased.
translation:
Hey you...
Have we met before?
Nah, I'm sure I don't have any
acquaintances anymore.
My only allies are the Numemon
of this city, who gave me shelter.
All the other Geremon have been
erased.

original:
You look strong...
What's it feel like?
My partner was erased...
I felt so unbearably frustrated.
So much so I vowed to train my
skills and get stronger...
But I guess it's too late for that, 
isn't it?
translation:
You look strong...
What's it feel like?
My partner was erased...
I felt so unbearably frustrated.
So much so I vowed to train my
skills and get stronger...
But I guess it's too late for that, 
isn't it?

original:
You defeated the Local Champion?

Then that means the Numemon
couldn't stop you...
But they were honorable, weren't 
they? They didn't run away.
...Unlike me.
translation:
You defeated the Local Champion?

Then that means the Numemon
couldn't stop you...
But they were honorable, weren't 
they? They didn't run away.
...Unlike me.

original:
You're already a Bronze Tamer?

That's great... really.
translation:
You're already a Bronze Tamer?

That's great... really.

original:
Since when did you achieve the
rank of Silver Tamer?
That's no easy feat. Really.
It's worthy of respect.
translation:
Since when did you achieve the
rank of Silver Tamer?
That's no easy feat. Really.
It's worthy of respect.

original:
You've reached Gold Tamer?!
Whoa! That's incredible!
I bet nothing scares you now,
right?!
translation:
You've reached Gold Tamer?!
Whoa! That's incredible!
I bet nothing scares you now,
right?!

original:
Everyone's gone...
Did the Selectors erase everyone?
Say... do you plan on rescuing
everyone...?
.........
I see... I finally understand now.
I always wondered what the point
was in getting so strong...
I only thought about myself, so
that's why I didn't understand...
translation:
Everyone's gone...
Did the Selectors erase everyone?
Say... do you plan on rescuing
everyone...?
.........
I see... I finally understand now.
I always wondered what the point
was in getting so strong...
I only thought about myself, so
that's why I didn't understand...

original:
Oh! What?
You... are you a Tamer?
Well, well, well! ... Wait!
Then, what do you want??
You wanna defeat the Champion?
Again, again, again!
That's so reckless!
Very reckless indeed! Right?!
That person is scary strong!
They'll make you shriek in fear!
Just being glared at is enough
to make your teeth chatter!
Cold sweat will be gushing out! 
Don't you get it?!
translation:
Oh! What?
You... are you a Tamer?
Well, well, well! ... Wait!
Then, what do you want??
You wanna defeat the Champion?
Again, again, again!
That's so reckless!
Very reckless indeed! Right?!
That person is scary strong!
They'll make you shriek in fear!
Just being glared at is enough
to make your teeth chatter!
Cold sweat will be gushing out! 
Don't you get it?!

original:
So you should just be a good kid
and turn around, got it?!
I won't say anything bad!
So you'll do that... right?!
translation:
So you should just be a good kid
and turn around, got it?!
I won't say anything bad!
So you'll do that... right?!

original:
Well, well, well?! You won?!
Against the Local Champion!?
Really?! You truly won?!
Well, well, well!
translation:
Well, well, well?! You won?!
Against the Local Champion!?
Really?! You truly won?!
Well, well, well!

original:
W-well, well, well!
You ranked up to Bronze?!
Isn't that great?! Well done!
Congratulations!
translation:
W-well, well, well!
You ranked up to Bronze?!
Isn't that great?! Well done!
Congratulations!

original:
W-well, well, well!
You ranked up to Silver?!
Again!? I'm in shock!
You did well! Great!
translation:
W-well, well, well!
You ranked up to Silver?!
Again!? I'm in shock!
You did well! Great!

original:
W-well, well, well!
You ranked up to Gold?!
I cannot believe you!
That's wonderful, isn't it?!
translation:
W-well, well, well!
You ranked up to Gold?!
I cannot believe you!
That's wonderful, isn't it?!

original:
W-well, well well!
The Selectors have struck?!
Are you okay?!
How about everyone else?!
.........
They were taken?!
Where?! You don't know!
Well, well, well!
That's terrible! Truly dreadful!
translation:
W-well, well well!
The Selectors have struck?!
Are you okay?!
How about everyone else?!
.........
They were taken?!
Where?! You don't know!
Well, well, well!
That's terrible! Truly dreadful!

original:
Hey... Do you know my Tamer?

We promised to meet here on
Graphics Board Continent, but...
I wonder where they went...
translation:
Hey... Do you know my Tamer?

We promised to meet here on
Graphics Board Continent, but...
I wonder where they went...

original:
As I thought, nume... 
My Tamer has been erased, too...
translation:
As I thought, nume... 
My Tamer has been erased, too...

original:
So you beat the Local Champion...

I see, you're not one to be taken
lightly, nume...
You must be skilled to be able to
defeat that person...
translation:
So you beat the Local Champion...

I see, you're not one to be taken
lightly, nume...
You must be skilled to be able to
defeat that person...

original:
You became a Bronze Tamer, 
nume?
You mean to say you entered
the Championship...?
Then what are you doing wandering
around here??
translation:
You became a Bronze Tamer, 
nume?
You mean to say you entered
the Championship...?
Then what are you doing wandering
around here??

original:
You're a Silver Tamer, now?
What are you doing here, then?
If you have time to be messing 
around in Numemon City...
Then you should battle! Fight and
aim for a higher rank, nume!
translation:
You're a Silver Tamer, now?
What are you doing here, then?
If you have time to be messing 
around in Numemon City...
Then you should battle! Fight and
aim for a higher rank, nume!

original:
You're a Gold Tamer...?
That's some impressive talent...
So you weren't just some
ordinary Tamer, nume...
Since you're not, you have to
work harder than everyone else.
As a talented person, that's your
responsibility!
translation:
You're a Gold Tamer...?
That's some impressive talent...
So you weren't just some
ordinary Tamer, nume...
Since you're not, you have to
work harder than everyone else.
As a talented person, that's your
responsibility!

original:
What? The Union's Tamers and
Digimon were all wiped out?!
...Hmph!
Don't say such stupid things!
You're still here, aren't you, nume?!

So long as you're still here, even if
everyone else is gone...
You can't call that being 'Wiped
out', nume!
translation:
What? The Union's Tamers and
Digimon were all wiped out?!
...Hmph!
Don't say such stupid things!
You're still here, aren't you, nume?!

So long as you're still here, even if
everyone else is gone...
You can't call that being 'Wiped
out', nume!

original:
Winning or losing, 
that doesn't matter.
You're making progress, that's
the most important thing.
That's good, right?!

That's it for now. 
Go out and do as you please!
translation:
Winning or losing, 
that doesn't matter.
You're making progress, that's
the most important thing.
That's good, right?!

That's it for now. 
Go out and do as you please!

original:
So the Local Champion has
accepted defeat?!
... I see, nume...

Then we have no other option but
to accept it as well, nume.
translation:
So the Local Champion has
accepted defeat?!
... I see, nume...

Then we have no other option but
to accept it as well, nume.

original:
So you ranked up Bronze? 
Many long to do the same...
You went and did it over at the
DigiColosseum, huh?
I felt so irritated, but now I
somehow feel relieved, nume.
It makes sense now, for me to
lose to such a Tamer.
translation:
So you ranked up Bronze? 
Many long to do the same...
You went and did it over at the
DigiColosseum, huh?
I felt so irritated, but now I
somehow feel relieved, nume.
It makes sense now, for me to
lose to such a Tamer.

original:
Wait, nume...
You're a Silver Tamer now?!
Hmmm... well, to get that far was
inevitable, nume!
After all, you beat Tres, nume!
translation:
Wait, nume...
You're a Silver Tamer now?!
Hmmm... well, to get that far was
inevitable, nume!
After all, you beat Tres, nume!

original:
What's this?! You're a Gold Tamer
now?! You sure are strong, nume!
But don't go getting carried
away, now!
You're ranking up too quickly,
nume!
Come on, give me some of that
talent!
translation:
What's this?! You're a Gold Tamer
now?! You sure are strong, nume!
But don't go getting carried
away, now!
You're ranking up too quickly,
nume!
Come on, give me some of that
talent!

original:
What? The DigiColosseum was
attacked by the Selectors?
Don't tell me the Bandits were
there, nume?!
They were?! But then do you know
what happened to them?!
If you don't know, then sorry!
Hurry and get on the case, nume!
translation:
What? The DigiColosseum was
attacked by the Selectors?
Don't tell me the Bandits were
there, nume?!
They were?! But then do you know
what happened to them?!
If you don't know, then sorry!
Hurry and get on the case, nume!

original:
Yo, nume!

I can't hear youuu!
I SAID YO, NUME!
What's with that sour face?
translation:
Yo, nume!

I can't hear youuu!
I SAID YO, NUME!
What's with that sour face?
